name: Let's Draw
shortDescription: Let's Draw is a simple drawing app where users can use freehand, line, and shape tools to draw art on the canvas. The demo is available at https://letsdraw.jideguru.dev/#/
longDescription: Let's Draw is a simple drawing app where users can use freehand, line, and shape tools to draw art on the canvas. The demo is available at https://letsdraw.jideguru.dev/#/
